G

GameController - Class in fruitninja.controller
The GameController class is the brains behind the fruitninja game.
GameController() - Constructor for class fruitninja.controller.GameController
Sets initial values, initializes the playing field, loads audio and sets up the panels in the frame.
GameObject - Class in fruitninja.model
The GameObject class is a model class which contains the position, size, worth and speed of a Game Object.
GameObject() - Constructor for class fruitninja.model.GameObject
Sets default values for the instance variables.
GameView - Class in fruitninja.view
The GameView class is an extension of the JPanel class and is used to show the rendered playing field of the fruitninja application.
GameView(Field) - Constructor for class fruitninja.view.GameView
Sets up the dimensions of the panel and loads the images to be used in the rendering process.
getLives() - Method in class fruitninja.model.Player
Returns the amount of lives the player has left.
getObject() - Method in class fruitninja.model.Field
Returns the GameObject in the field.
getPoints() - Method in class fruitninja.model.GameObject
Returns the amount of points the GameObject is worth.
getScore() - Method in class fruitninja.model.Player
Returns the player's current score.
getSize() - Method in class fruitninja.model.GameObject
Returns the size of the GameObject.
getSlash() - Method in class fruitninja.model.Field
Returns the Slash object in the field.
getType() - Method in class fruitninja.model.GameObject
Returns the type of the GameObject.
getX() - Method in class fruitninja.model.GameObject
Returns the x position of the GameObject.
getY() - Method in class fruitninja.model.GameObject
Returns the y position of the GameObject.
